issue.title: [Ruby] Depend on the same version as Red Arrow
issue.body:
***Note**: This issue was originally created as [ARROW-4299](https://issues.apache.org/jira/browse/ARROW-4299). Please see the [migration documentation](https://gist.github.com/toddfarmer/12aa88361532d21902818a6044fda4c3) for further details.*

### Original Issue Description:
Red Arrow CUDA, Red Plasma, Red Gandiva and Red Parquet depend on Red Arrow. But they don't specify Red Arrow version.

They don't work well without the same Red Arrow version. So they should depend on the same version as Red Arrow.

 

We will be able to implement with the following change:

 

```ruby

spec.add_runtime_dependency("red-arrow", "= #{spec.version}")
```
